columns.text: The old emblematic Opera of Santorini dating back to the 19th century has been totally renovated, transformed into the absolute epitome of luxury in the heart of the island. In perfect alignment with the traditional Theran architecture, the Opera Mansion is a cave-like building boasting ample spaces and splendidly lavish features. In the very same place where the first modern Hellenic Theatre performance was held, couples relax and enjoy a luxurious stay , combining the scent of traditional Santorini with state-of-the-art amenities, private pools and amazing volcano view , just a breath from the imposing caldera and the central Fira path.Opera Mansion provides the idyllic setting for couples seeking to isolate themselves from the world, without lacking anything in terms of smooth accessibility to the vibrant nightlife and omnipresent lifestyle of Fira.Upon reaching Opera Mansion, our team of professionals welcomes you to a whole new level of discreet services where privacy is never compromised and there is still always someone to tend to your every need or desire. From the special breakfast served in the vastness of the mansion with a fine selection of freshly baked pastries and high-quality ingredients to the concierge services eager to organize a private candlelight dinner under the starlit sky, you experience the ultimate fusion of romance, luxurious attentiveness and care.

items.title: Opera Mansion Villa
items.description: Private indoor heated and outdoor Pool, private outdoor Heated Jacuzzi, steam room, Wine & Dine cellar, Walk in Closet.

items.seo_title: Opera Mansion Villa | Rooms | Opera Mansion Villa Santorini
items.seo_description: Opera Mansion Villa has 200 sq.m of living space. It features indoor and outdoor heated pools, private outdoor jacuzzi, wine & dine cellar, walk-in closet.

items.title: Good to Know:
items.description: The old emblematic Opera of Santorini dating back to the 19th century has been totally renovated, transformed into the absolute epitome of luxury in the heart of the island.

items.title: Ayoba Santorini
items.description: Ayoba is ideally nested in the beautiful village of Imerovigli, just steps from the cascading caldera and close to the bustling capital of Fira. Ayoba is not a formal word. It’s a made-up one that originates from the townships of South Africa where it’s used to express appreciation of good dancing! Experience the grace and beauty of Ayoba Santorini, authentic accommodation in the heart of exquisite Imerovigli village, one of the most romantic and picturesque spots on Earth. Ayoba is not a formal word. It’s a made-up one that originates from the townships of South Africa where it’s used to express appreciation of good dancing! It is slang for “cool, alright, ok”. In Zulu, it means “will be”. Ayoba is a feel-good word. It takes us to our a happy place. A place that’s more than alright actually, better then cool: the ravishing slice of Santorini. Experience the grace and beauty of Ayoba Santorini, authentic accommodation in the heart of exquisite Imerovigli village, one of the most romantic and picturesque spots on Earth. The secluded location of Ayoba will evoke your senses as you peacefully surrender to the ageless spell of Santorini.
items.excerpt: Ayoba is ideally nested in the beautiful village of Imerovigli, just steps from the cascading caldera and close to the bustling capital of Fira.

amenities.item: An authentic accommodation in the heart of exquisite Imerovigli village, Santorini island
Consisting of two suites and four double studios

items.title: Villa Dakoronia
items.description: ‘Villa Dakoronia’ was recently renovated from an old theran villa and is situated on the top of the cliff ridge along the traditional caldera path between Fira and Firostefani, facing the spectacular Caldera view. Villa Dakoronia encompasses all special features composing luxury living in a privileged spot of the island. On the caldera path connecting Fira and Firostefani, this luxurious villa offers a truly wonderful holiday experience. Aesthetically supreme and lavishly decorated, designed with comfort and practicality in mind, Villa Dakoronia guarantees the optimal lodging for everyone seeking privacy, serenity and incomparable views to the infinite blue of the Aegean Sea, the fierce rock formations of the caldera and the emblematic volcano.

SEO.title: Opera Mansion Villa Santorini | Aqua Vista Hotels
SEO.description: Aqua Vista Hotel's Opera Mansion Villa Santorini is the renovated 19th century Opera of Santorini. It boasts ample spaces & lavish features.
